name: Coffee Cat
description:
!!! The mac build for this game has a slight issue with permission, but you can still download it and open it by going into Security & Privacy > General > Open anyway !!!

Coffee cat works at Meow Inc. where cat workers used to produce newspapers daily. They have been very tired recently and can't stop falling asleep. At this rate, Meow Inc. would have to be shut down! As Coffee cat, your job is to get as many of the cat workers awake. Together, we can save Meow Inc. ! 

Keep the cat workers awake by giving them coffee whenever they fall asleep. Don't forget to help them bring the newspapers to the conveyor belt!

Controls --------------------------------

WASD : Move around

Spacebar : Jump

Q : Make coffee when near coffee machine

Left/right click : Grab/release items

---------------------------------------------

This is my second game made for Brackey's game jam under the theme "Stronger Together"! All the models and most of the sound effects are made by me. The background music track is by Fesliyan Studios :

Credit: https://www.FesliyanStudios.com Background Music
